properties.entry: CREATE TABLE ${table_pois} ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, picture CONTENT BLOB, phone CHARACTER(10), postal_code CHARACTER(6), name TEXT, website TEXT, type_id INT, email TEXT, latitude FLOAT, longitude FLOAT, city_id INT, street TEXT, street_no INT, description_FR TEXT, description_EN TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(type_id) REFERENCES ${table_types}(id), FOREIGN KEY(city_id) REFERENCES ${table_cities}(id) ); CREATE INDEX idx_coords_on_pois ON ${table_pois}(type_id,longitude,latitude);
